definitions.text: directly and without evasion; not roundabout
examples: the responsibility lies squarely with them
spoke forthright (or forthrightly) and to the point
looked him squarely in the eye
the bat met the ball squarely
planted his great bulk square before his enemy
a squarely cut piece of paper
folded the sheet of paper square

definitions.text: with firmness and conviction; without compromise; - C.G.Bowers
examples: he stood foursquare for religious liberty and toleration
